All Classes and Interfaces

类
说明
CurrentOrderController
Controller for CurrentOrderView that handles order-detail display, editing, and confirmation.
Deluxe
An object class that represents Deluxe pizzas.
Hawaiian
An object class that represents Hawaiian pizzas.
MainApplication
Driver to launch the Window for the main application.
MainController
Main Controller that handles ordering functions.
Order
Order Class that store customer's phone number and the pizza list he/she orders.
Pepperoni
An object class that represents Pepperoni pizzas.
Pizza
Abstract class of Pizza.
PizzaController
Controller for PizzaView that handles pizza customization for all three kinds of pizza.
PizzaMaker
Create the instance of a pizza of any kind depend on the flavor selected.
Size
Sizes that a pizza can have.
StoreOrderController
Controller for StoreOrderView that handles order cancellation and exporting.
Topping
Toppings that a pizza can have in an order.
